
public class Q11_B_JAVA_Ass {
	public static int area(int length ,int  breadth)
	{
		return length*breadth;
	}
	public static int perimeter(int length ,int breadth)
	{
		return 2*length+breadth;
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Q11_B_JAVA_Ass obj=new Q11_B_JAVA_Ass();
		System.out.println("Area of rectangle : "+obj.area(4,8));
		System.out.println("Perimeter of Trinagle :"+obj.perimeter(5,10));
		

	}

}

Output:-

Area of rectangle woithout using mthod:32
Perimeter of rectangle without using method :16
